thread.title: Watch NFL on TV

title: Watch NFL on TV
text:
Email Watch NFL on TV 
TVNZ’s newest channel will bring you all the hottest action from U.S. with live coverage, game replays and a weekly highlights show! 
Watch NFL on TVNZ Pop-Up Channel, Freeview channel 13 Watch LIVE – With live coverage, direct from the US Watch AGAIN – Can’t watch the game live? Each live game is repeated later on during the day Watch THE BEST – With a weekly highlights show bringing you all the latest action from the games you didn’t see 

How to get the TVNZ Pop-Up Channel 
The TVNZ Pop-Up Channel is available on Freeview (channel 13) and is free to all Freeview users. 
If you don’t yet have access to the channel, you can find out how to tune in using this guide . 
Watch online 
We’re also covering NFL online, with live matches and highlights available on TVNZ OnDemand. You’ll be able to watch on desktop, tablet and mobile. Find out more about our NFL coverage on TVNZ OnDemand . Text Size
